How to Activate Norton: 8 Steps (with Pictures) - wikiHow 
 Home Random Browse Articles Add to This Page Add Tip Easy Ways to Help Approve Questions Review Tech Feedback Fix Spelling More Things to Try...   
 Log in / Sign up   
 Desktop Site   
 Talk How to Activate Norton   
 Norton is one of the more popular security software around for quite a while now. There are free trials available for download. However, if you want to experience the full security features of Norton, you will have to activate your product. 
 Steps Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/91\/Activate-Norton-Step-1.jpg\/v4-460px-Activate-Norton-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/91\/Activate-Norton-Step-1.jpg\/v4-760px-Activate-Norton-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Locate your product key.  Your product key's location depends on how you got your product:
 If you purchased and downloaded Norton online, then the product key is in your confirmation e-mail. If it is not in your inbox, then check your spam folder. 
 If you purchased a physical copy of Norton, then the product key is inside the box. It can be printed on a sticker on the back of the CD case or printed on a card inside the box. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Activate-Norton-Step-2-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Activate-Norton-Step-2-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Activate-Norton-Step-2-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Activate-Norton-Step-2-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Launch Norton on your computer.  Locate the Norton icon on your desktop and double-click it.
 The Norton product window will appear. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/23\/Activate-Norton-Step-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Activate-Norton-Step-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/23\/Activate-Norton-Step-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Activate-Norton-Step-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click the “Renew” link.  At the bottom part of the window that appeared, click the yellow-colored “Renew” link.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9f\/Activate-Norton-Step-4-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Activate-Norton-Step-4-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9f\/Activate-Norton-Step-4-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Activate-Norton-Step-4-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":346.8956043956,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":573.13186813187} 
 4 
 Click the “I have a key or code to enter” button.  This button will be on the small window that will appear after clicking “Renew.”
 After clicking “Renew,” the subscription window will show. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b8\/Activate-Norton-Step-5-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Activate-Norton-Step-5-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b8\/Activate-Norton-Step-5-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Activate-Norton-Step-5-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":346.8956043956,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":573.13186813187} 
 5 
 Enter the product key.  On the subscription window, enter the product key on the field at the bottom of the screen.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d9\/Activate-Norton-Step-6-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Activate-Norton-Step-6-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d9\/Activate-Norton-Step-6-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Activate-Norton-Step-6-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":346.8956043956,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":573.13186813187} 
 6 
 Click “Next. ” 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5c\/Activate-Norton-Step-7-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Activate-Norton-Step-7-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5c\/Activate-Norton-Step-7-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Activate-Norton-Step-7-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":346.8956043956,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":573.13186813187} 
 7 
 Review your subscription details. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f3\/Activate-Norton-Step-8-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Activate-Norton-Step-8-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f3\/Activate-Norton-Step-8-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Activate-Norton-Step-8-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":346.8956043956,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":573.13186813187} 
 8 
 Click “Done. ”
